attributes.action: Reconsider the decision regarding the Union Flag being removed from Belfast City Hall
attributes.additional_details:
Do you believe the wrong decision was made regarding the Union Flag being removed from the Belfast City Hall?

If so, please sign your name in an attempt to get the matter reconsidered by Belfast City Council.

This is a matter that means a lot to people - The Union Flag has flown above Belfast for over 100 years, there is no need for change now!
